product_overview: An AI-driven system enabling users to verify the trustworthiness and sentiment of online products by analyzing e-commerce URLs. It helps shoppers make informed purchase decisions by evaluating product reviews, seller reputation, and domain reliability using advanced web scraping and machine learning techniques.
core_goals: Provide users with an easy-to-use platform to assess product authenticity and sentiment from online stores.
Automatically scrape comprehensive product data and customer reviews from multiple e-commerce sites and social platforms.
Utilize AI/ML models to perform sentiment analysis classifying reviews into positive, neutral, and negative categories.
Calculate a nuanced trustworthiness score based on multi-factor criteria such as review quality, domain reputation, seller reputation, and price reasonableness.
Deliver clear, actionable recommendations (e.g., Buy, Avoid, Be Careful) with confidence indicators to guide user decisions.
Expose a robust API interface for integration and extensibility.
key_features: Web-based user dashboard for submitting product URLs and receiving detailed trust and sentiment reports.
Backend web scraper supporting Amazon, Daraz, eBay, and generic e-commerce platforms to fetch product details and reviews.
Sentiment analysis engine using Scikit-learn and TextBlob to analyze and classify customer reviews.
Trust scoring algorithm evaluating domain trust, review quality, rating consistency, seller reputation, and price reasonableness.
API endpoint for external applications to request product trust and sentiment analysis results.
Comprehensive analysis output including product info, sentiment breakdown, trust scores, and AI-powered buying recommendations.
user_flow_summary: User inputs a product or e-commerce URL into the web interface.
Backend scraper fetches product details, reviews, and seller information from the URL source.
Sentiment analysis module processes the collected reviews to classify sentiments and generate scores.
Trust scoring module calculates overall trustworthiness from multiple factors including domain and seller reputation.
Results are formatted and sent back to the user dashboard and API client showing product info, sentiment metrics, trust scores, and recommendation with confidence and color coding.
User reviews the analysis and makes an informed buying decision based on AI recommendations.
validation_criteria: System correctly fetches product data and reviews from supported e-commerce platforms without errors.
Sentiment analysis classifies review sentiments into positive, neutral, and negative with high accuracy.
Trust score computation fairly represents product trustworthiness considering all component scores.
API endpoints comply fully with OpenAPI 3.0 specifications and handle errors gracefully (400 and 500 status codes).
Frontend interface loads correctly and displays all data fields including sentiment summary, trust percentage, and recommendation.
System recommendation message aligns logically with sentiment and trust scores, providing clear user guidance.
